name: Bellibolt
description: The EleFrog Pokémon. When this Pokémon expands and contracts its wobbly body, the belly-button dynamo in its stomach produces a huge amount of electricity.

abilities.name: Electromorphosis
abilities.description: When this Pokémon takes damage, it may double the MOVE damage modifier of its next electric-type move.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Damp
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by Self Destruct and Explosion moves.
